org.perfcake.message.sender

Class AbstractSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.perfcake.message.sender.AbstractSender
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageSender
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractJmsSender, AbstractSocketSender, CamelSender, CoapSender, CommandSender, DummySender, HttpSender, ChannelSender, JdbcSender, LdapSender, MqttSender, ScriptSender, WebSocketSender

    public abstract class AbstractSender
extends Object
implements MessageSender
    The common ancestor for all senders. Facilitates logging and target specification.
    Author:
    Martin Večeřa

      • init

        public final void init()
                throws PerfCakeException
        Description copied from interface: MessageSender
        Initializes the sender. This method is executed once the sender is properly created based on the configuration in the scenario.
        Specified by:
        init in interface MessageSender
        Throws:
        PerfCakeException - When anything fails, basically this happens when a connection to the target could not have been established.

        Description copied from interface: MessageSender
        Sends a message.
        Specified by:

      • preSend

        public void preSend(Message message,
                    Properties messageAttributes)
             throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: MessageSender
        Performs any action that needs to be done to send the message but is not directly related to the sending operation and thus not measured.
        Specified by:
        preSend in interface MessageSender
        Parameters:
        message - Message to be sent.
        messageAttributes - Attributes that can be used to replace placeholders in message and or target.
        Throws:
        Exception - In case anything fails during the preparation.

      • doSend

        public abstract Serializable doSend(Message message,
                                    MeasurementUnit measurementUnit)
                             throws Exception
        Actually performs the send operation. Should be overridden by specific implementations.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to be sent.
        measurementUnit - Measurement unit carrying the current stop-watch.
        Returns:
        Response to the message.
        Throws:
        Exception - When the sending operation failed.
        See Also:
        MessageSender.send(org.perfcake.message.Message, org.perfcake.reporting.MeasurementUnit)

      • postSend

        public void postSend(Message message)
              throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: MessageSender
        Performs any action that needs to be done to complete the sending of the message but is not directly related to the sending operation and thus not measured.
        Specified by:
        postSend in interface MessageSender
        Parameters:
        message - Message that was sent.
        Throws:
        Exception - In case anything fails during the finalization.

      • safeGetTarget

        public final String safeGetTarget(Properties properties)
        Gets the target in a safe way to avoid NPE when properties are null.
        Parameters:
        properties - Properties to replace placeholders in the target.
        Returns:
        The target template with placeholders replaced.

      • isKeepConnection

        public boolean isKeepConnection()
        Should we try to preserve connection between sending of individual messages? Placeholders in the target address cannot be replaced with properties nor sequences when set to true. Defaults to true.
        Returns:
        True iff the connection is kept open.

      • setKeepConnection

        public AbstractSender setKeepConnection(boolean keepConnection)
        Should we try to preserve connection between sending of individual messages? Placeholders in the target address cannot be replaced with properties nor sequences when set to true. Defaults to true.
        Parameters:
        keepConnection - True when the connection should be kept open.
        Returns:
        Instance of this to support fluent API.
